metadata.title: CVE-2022-3375 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from11.10 before 15.8.5, all versions starting from 15.9 before 15.9.4, allversions starting from 15.10 before 15.10.1. It was possible to disclosethe branch names when attacker has a fork of a project that was switched toprivate.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
